message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product, but I am hoping to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $8,000? I believe this would be a fair compromise.
Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget. While $8,000 is a bit low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $8,750?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, I propose we aim for $8,500. This seems like a reasonable midpoint between our positions.
